articles.title: Grand Theft Auto 5 Surpasses 200 Million Units Sold - IGN
articles.description: Grand Theft Auto 5, an 11-year-old game that's been released on three generations of consoles and which continues to sell roughly five million copies every three months, has at last surpassed a big milestone: over 200 million copies sold in its lifetime.
